title: Combat
content: Combat for Baldur's Gate 3 brings an immersive and tactical combat experience with is new and old combat mechanics of the game. With a combat system combines the aspects of turn-based and real-time action, it follows the ruleset of the Dungeons & Dragon's 5th edition. Each Class, Race, and Origin Character gives players a different experience as they vary in Skill, Abilities, Strengths, Weapon set and more.
